thread.title: Lloyd Thomson: The boy from Footscray who made a difference in the world
thread.title_full: Lloyd Thomson: The boy from Footscray who made a difference in the world

title: Lloyd Thomson: The boy from Footscray who made a difference in the world
text:
Lloyd Thomson: The boy from Footscray... Lloyd Thomson: The boy from Footscray who made a difference in the world 3 hrs ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
Lloyd Thomson was a modest and private man who came from humble origins to go on to lead an extraordinary life for a boy from Footscray. Lloyd was a successful career diplomat who lived quietly in Strathmore for more than 30 years after his retirement from the Department of Foreign Affairs.   Sydney Morning Herald.
